records.city: CASE WHEN s.city = '' THEN 'NA' ELSE s.city END
records.state: CASE WHEN s.state = '' THEN 'NA' ELSE s.state END
records.country: CASE WHEN s.country = '' THEN 'NA' ELSE s.country END

source_query.#: Only include lines that are from authenticated users and
are requests for interactive apps or reverse proxy servers,
and exclude requests for app icons, images, stylesheets,
scripts, datafiles, etc., unless they are being loaded from the
where: (s.request_path NOT REGEXP '\\.(aff|css|dic|gif|ico|jpeg|jpg|js|json|map|mp3|oga|ogg|otf|png|rstheme|svg|ttf|wasm|woff|woff2)(\\?.*)?$' OR s.request_path REGEXP '^/pun/sys/dashboard/files/(api/[^/]+/)?(edit|fs)/.+' OR s.request_path LIKE '/pun/sys/files/fs/%' OR s.request_path LIKE '/pun/sys/file-editor/edit/%')
